Madara Organic Skincare Comforting toner

Brand: Madara

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Centaurea Cyanus (Cornflower) Flower Water, Melissa Officinalis (Melissa) Water, Betaine, Chamomilla Recutita (Camomile) Flower Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium levulinate, Hydrolysed Glycosaminoglycans, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Rhamnose, Glucose,

Flower Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium levulinate, Hydrolysed Glycosaminoglycans, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Rhamnose, Glucose, Glucuronic Acid
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
